&nbsp; &nbsp;

I'm **David Causeur**, full professor of statistics

in the Department of Statistics and Computer Science,

at [Institut Agro](https://www.institut-agro-rennes-angers.fr/), Rennes, France.

I'm a research fellow at [IRMAR, UMR 6625 CNRS](https://irmar.univ-rennes1.fr/)

I'm the former President of the [French region](https://sfb.pages.math.cnrs.fr/asso/) of the [International Biometric Society](https://www.biometricsociety.org/home).

For more check out my [resume](DC-CV_short.pdf).
